entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:25 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
